data.message: Hey facebook, how can I block things on my feed that I cannot comment on or like?  If I can't like it, or comment on it, I don't want to see it. I don't mind political discussion, but I don't appreciate having to share a fabrication just to comment that it is a fabrication.

replies.message: Hi Greg. Here are some tips on how to hide stories that appear in your News Feed: http://on.fb.me/1UAWEOY. Let us know if you have any more questions! -Jordan
